meanings.definition: In a manner relating to epitaxy.
meanings.sent1: The crystal grew epitaxially on the surface, following its pattern precisely.
meanings.sent2: The thin film was epitaxially deposited on the silicon wafer.
meanings.sent3: The molecules danced epitaxially into place, like synchronized swimmers.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts aligned epitaxially with his, creating a harmonious bond.
meanings.sent5: The vines climbed epitaxially up the trellis, intertwining perfectly.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves the growth of a crystalline substance on a substrate.
meanings.sent1: The semiconductor material was epitaxially grown on the silicon wafer.
meanings.sent2: The new layer formed epitaxially on top of the existing crystal lattice.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate chips spread epitaxially on the cookie dough, creating a delicious pattern.
meanings.sent4: His ideas seemed to epitaxially attach to hers, forming a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The snowflakes fell epitaxially on the frozen lake, each one finding its place.
